oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: US M1917 Helmet
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: US M1917 helmet of Pvt. Euliss Grant Hallowell of Buena Vista, Carroll County, Tenn. The helmet is very similar to the British "Brodies" helmet and was the standard for American soldiers. Hallowell (Hollowell) served in HQ Co., 63rd Art. Brig., Coastal Corps. The Coastal Artillery manned coastal defenses. Hallowell served at Ft. Pickens and Ft. Barrancas until being sent to France in September 1918. He farmed and ran a sorghum mill in Carroll County after the war.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: World War, 1914-1918; World War, 1914-1918 - History
